ordinal_id.description: An ordinal identifier for an entity monomer component.

chem_comp_count.description: The number of the particular chemical components in the polymer entity.

chem_comp_polymer_fraction.description: The fractional composition of the monomer in the polymer entity sequence.

comp_id.description: The component identifier for the monomer in the polymer sequence.

entity_id.description: The entity identifier for the polymer entity containing the monomer.

entry_id.description: The entry identifier containing the polymer entity.

is_modified.description: Flag to indicate a non-standard monomer.

ordinal_id.description: An ordinal identifier for a polymer component.

datablock_name.description: Source data block containing the loaded data set

locator.description: Locator of file containing loaded data
